channel.title: blogging on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Bodacious Blog

item.title: About this weblog
item.description: Purpose I’ve started this blog to cast some light on my activities. My goal is to do all of my programming through a terminal, forever, and see where that leads. Big topics I’ll be covering: emacs Natural Language Processing python vim math Thanks for reading! Colophon This blog was made with hugo, a static site generator, emacs and a bit of my own handiwork.
